catalogue_raissonne: Bartsch XVIII.316.6; TIB anon artists after Reni no.6. 225
description: seated woman holding child; woman and child holding beads; image in oval frame with floral and foliate designs at corners
inscription:
Inscription

in plate in black: [VERGINE BELLA I VOSTRI ETERNI FIORI/ COMPOSER PER MIO, BEN QUESTI ROSARI, / OND\' IO CON ESSI Á RINGRATIARVI IMPARI/ PER GL\' IMMENSI OTTENUTI ALTI FAVORI]; in pencil in plate: [2-201]
title: Madonna and Child with Rosaries
